title: Handle a Tenant Parking Dispute
description: A tenant reports that an unauthorized vehicle is parked in their assigned parking spot.

tasks.description: Receive the complaint from the tenant, including the location and a description of the unauthorized vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the details of the complaint.

tasks.description: Check the property's parking log to see if the vehicle belongs to another tenant or guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the vehicle is not registered with the property.

tasks.description: Follow property policy, which may include placing a warning sticker on the vehicle and, if not moved, contacting a towing company.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the standard procedure for parking violations.
